DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy Lastacaft® ( Alcaftadine 0.25 % ) Pataday™ ( Olopatadine 0.2 % ) compare placebo prevention ocular itch associate allergic conjunctivitis .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Lastacaft® Compared Pataday™ Placebo Patients With Acute Allergic Conjunctivitis
DOC.criteria: History ocular allergy within past 24 month . Able avoid wear contact lens least 72 hour prior study trial period . Any presence active ocular infection history ocular herpetic infection . Ocular surgery within 3 month prior first visit refractive surgery within past 6 month . Have plan surgery study 30 day study .
